<title level="2" right="Creature 20">[Blue Viper (Level 20)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1528)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 54</row>

**Perception** +33; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43), [Ysoki](/Languages.aspx?ID=61)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +29, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +28, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +26, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +35, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +33

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +7

**Con** +4

**Int** +5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Infused Items** Blue Viper carries the following infused items: 3 [major acid flasks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74), 5 [black lotus extracts](/Equipment.aspx?ID=107), 3 [major bottled lightnings](/Equipment.aspx?ID=76), 4 [true elixirs of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91), 3 [major frost vials](/Equipment.aspx?ID=77), 2 [mindfog mists](/Equipment.aspx?ID=123), 3 [oblivion essences](/Equipment.aspx?ID=558), 3 [major tanglefoot bags](/Equipment.aspx?ID=78), 5 [tears of death](/Equipment.aspx?ID=130), and 2 [major thunderstones](/Equipment.aspx?ID=79). These items last for 24 hours, or until the next time Blue Viper makes his daily preparations.

**Items**
[dragon bile](/Equipment.aspx?ID=112) (applied to body), hidden cheek needles, _+3 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 44 

**Fort** +30 

**Ref** +36 

**Will** +33 

+3 status to all saves vs. [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)
</row>

**HP** 366

**Immunities**
[poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)

**Poisoned Coat <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature adjacent to Blue Viper hits him with a melee unarmed Strike** **Effect** The triggering creature is exposed to [dragon bile](/Equipment.aspx?ID=112). This consumes the poison, and Blue Viper can't use Poisoned Coat again until he takes 10 minutes and uses one dose of [contact](/Traits.aspx?ID=37) or [injury](/Traits.aspx?ID=97) poison to apply to his clothing.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_shortsword_ +38 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 4d6+11 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
alchemical bomb +38 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** varies by bomb

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hidden cheek needles +35 ([Concealable](/Traits.aspx?ID=327), [range increment 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 9 piercing plus [tears of death](/Equipment.aspx?ID=130) or [black lotus extract](/Equipment.aspx?ID=107)

**Plum Rain Deluge** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Certain Kill](/Traits.aspx?ID=384), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** Blue Viper accelerates the flow of time so his poisons run their course faster. He Interacts to draw a [contact](/Traits.aspx?ID=37) poison and throws it in the air, where it showers down in a 20-foot burst within 60 feet. All creatures in the burst are automatically exposed to the poison, bypassing any onset time, and each creature must attempt a saving throw against that poison. If a creature fails, the duration of any beneficial spells or effects affecting the creature are reduced by 3 rounds (or by 6 rounds on a critical failure).

**Pinpoint Poisoner**   When Blue Viper successfully Strikes a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature with a poisoned weapon or exposes a flat-footed creature to an [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) poison, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.

**Poison Spray** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** Blue Viper is holding a [contact](/Traits.aspx?ID=37) or [injury](/Traits.aspx?ID=97) poison; **Effect** Blue Viper swigs the poison and sprays it out of his mouth, affecting a 15-foot cone. Blue Viper is not exposed to the poison. All creatures in the cone are immediately exposed to the poison, bypassing any onset time, and each creature must attempt a Fortitude save against the poison.

**Potent Poisoner**   Blue Viper's infused poisons have a DC of 47.

**Quick Application** <actions string="Single Action" />  Blue Viper Interacts to draw an [injury](/Traits.aspx?ID=97) poison and applies it to a weapon he is holding.

**Quick Bomber** <actions string="Single Action" />  Blue Viper Interacts to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.

</column>
name: Blue Viper (Level 20)
